properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 7:39PM CST until January 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wintry mix initially changing to mostly freezing rain.
Light accumulations of sleet and snow possible. Total ice
accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...Hartley, Oldham and Deaf Smith Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible with bridges
and overpasses seeing the greatest impacts. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY
